attributes.action: drastically improve the quality of residential staff in care homes by providing high quality and appropriate training, good rates of pay and a solid career structure.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Staff who work in residential care homes with the elderly and adults and children with learning disability should be of the highest calibre we can find.  They should be trained to a high standard, benefit from an encouraging and enabling career structure and be paid a great deal more than the minimum wage.  Use of agency and transient staff might therefore become a thing of the past and the quality of care improve dramatically.
